Package automata

Class CellularAutomaton

java.lang.Object
automata.CellularAutomaton
public class CellularAutomaton extends Object
Cellular Automaton for simulating pedestrian evacuation.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected final List<Pedestrian>
    inScenarioPedestrians
    List of pedestrians currently within the scenario.
    protected final Neighbourhood
    neighbourhood
    Neighbourhood relationship used by this automaton.
    protected boolean[][]
    occupied
    true if cell is occupied by a pedestrian in current discrete state.
    protected boolean[][]
    occupiedNextState
    true if cell will be occupied by a pedestrian in next discrete state.
    protected final List<Pedestrian>
    outOfScenarioPedestrians
    List of pedestrians that have evacuated the scenario.
    protected final CellularAutomatonParameters
    parameters
    Parameters describing this automaton.
    protected final PedestrianFactory
    pedestrianFactory
    Factory for generating pedestrians for this automaton.
    protected final Scenario
    scenario
    Scenario where simulation takes place.
    protected int
    timeSteps
    Number of discrete time steps elapsed since the start of the simulation.

    • addPedestrian

      public boolean addPedestrian(int row, int column, PedestrianParameters parameters)
      Adds a new pedestrian to this automaton.
      Parameters:
      row - row of scenario where new pedestrian should be placed.
      column - column of scenario where new pedestrian should be placed.
      parameters - parameters describing new pedestrian.
      Returns:
      true if pedestrian could be created (location was neither blocked nor taken by another pedestrian).

    • addPedestrian

      public boolean addPedestrian(Location location, PedestrianParameters parameters)
      Adds a new pedestrian to this automaton.
      Parameters:
      location - location in scenario where new pedestrian should be placed.
      parameters - parameters describing new pedestrian.
      Returns:
      true if pedestrian could be created (location was neither blocked nor taken by another pedestrian).

    • addPedestriansUniformly

      public void addPedestriansUniformly(int numberOfPedestrians, PedestrianParameters parameters)
      Adds a given number of new pedestrians located uniform randomly among free cells in automaton's scenario.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPedestrians - number of new pedestrian to add.
      parameters - parameters describing new pedestrians.

    • isCellReachable

      public boolean isCellReachable(int row, int column)
      Checks whether a cell can be reached by some pedestrian (i.e. there is no pedestrian occupying the cell and the cell is not blocked in the scenario).
      Parameters:
      row - row of cell to check.
      column - column of cell to check.
      Returns:
      true if cell can be reached by some pedestrian.
